The_Tough_Guy.mitigation_focus: Developing emotional awareness, practicing vulnerability, accepting help from others.

The_Saint.core_pattern: Presents as morally superior; harbors resentment/judgment
The_Saint.mitigation_focus: Setting healthy boundaries, acknowledging own needs, expressing resentment directly.

Passive_Aggressive_Charmer.core_pattern: Avoids direct confrontation; expresses resistance indirectly
observable_behaviors: Consistently delays task assigned by X person
Passive_Aggressive_Charmer.mitigation_focus: Developing assertiveness, practicing direct communication, addressing conflicts openly. Script/polarity management for pre-planned responses.

The_Victim.core_pattern: Views life through powerlessness; focuses on external problems
The_Victim.mitigation_focus: Taking personal responsibility, identifying actionable steps, accepting support.

The_People_Pleaser.core_pattern: Prioritizes others' approval/comfort over own needs; fears rejection
The_People_Pleaser.mitigation_focus: Setting boundaries, practicing saying no, prioritizing self-care.

The_Control_Freak.mitigation_focus: Practicing trust, accepting uncertainty, allowing others autonomy.

The_Perfectionist.core_pattern: Equates self-worth with flawless performance; fear of mistakes
The_Perfectionist.mitigation_focus: Embracing 'good enough', developing self-compassion, focusing on progress.

The_Achiever.core_pattern: Driven by accomplishment and external validation
The_Achiever.mitigation_focus: Balancing achievement with rest, internal validation, self-care practices.

The_Challenger.core_pattern: Pushes others to grow through direct feedback and high expectations
The_Challenger.mitigation_focus: Softening communication style, recognizing others' pace, balancing challenge with support.

The_Intellectual.core_pattern: Approaches life via thinking/analysis; avoids emotional experiences
The_Intellectual.mitigation_focus: Connecting with emotions, practicing emotional expression, balancing analysis with feeling.

The_Analyst.core_pattern: Systematic, logical thinking; data-driven decision making
The_Analyst.mitigation_focus: Balancing logic with intuition, acting with incomplete data, trusting gut feelings.

The_Skeptic.mitigation_focus: Balancing skepticism with openness, recognizing when evidence is sufficient, trusting others' expertise.

The_Empath.core_pattern: Heightened sensitivity to, and absorption of, others' emotions
The_Empath.mitigation_focus: Setting emotional boundaries, distinguishing own emotions from others', practicing self-protection.

The_Caretaker.core_pattern: Focuses on nurturing others' needs, often neglecting self
The_Caretaker.mitigation_focus: Setting boundaries, learning to receive help, focusing on self-development.

The_Mediator_Peacemaker.core_pattern: Seeks harmony/balance; avoids conflict to maintain peace
The_Mediator_Peacemaker.mitigation_focus: Expressing own needs, tolerating conflict, recognizing when harmony isn't possible.

The_Diplomat.core_pattern: Navigates complex social situations through tact and charm
observable_behaviors: Adjusting communication style for different audiences
The_Diplomat.mitigation_focus: Maintaining authenticity, balancing adaptability with core values, avoiding manipulation.

The_Visionary.core_pattern: Focuses on future possibilities and inspiration
The_Visionary.mitigation_focus: Balancing vision with execution, attending to present details, completing projects.

The_Rebel_Innovator.core_pattern: Challenges conventions; constantly generates new ideas/approaches
The_Rebel_Innovator.mitigation_focus: Following through on ideas, recognizing value in established methods, balancing innovation with stability.

The_Pragmatist_Traditionalist.mitigation_focus: Remaining open to new approaches, balancing tradition with innovation, recognizing when change is needed.

Catastrophizing.core_pattern: Magnifying negative situations and imagining worst-case scenarios
observable_behaviors: Expressing 3+ worst-case scenarios in a single discussion
Catastrophizing.mitigation_focus: Conscious awareness, incremental exposure (practice alternative responses).

Defensiveness.core_pattern: Immediate rejection of feedback or criticism to protect self-image
observable_behaviors: Immediate rejection of feedback (verbally, body language)
Defensiveness.mitigation_focus: Practicing active listening, seeking feedback integration, developing self-awareness.

Emotional_Unavailability.core_pattern: Avoids emotional intimacy and vulnerability in relationships
observable_behaviors: Abruptly changes topic when intimacy is requested
Emotional_Unavailability.mitigation_focus: Gradual exposure to emotional conversations, practicing emotional expression, building trust incrementally.

Procrastination.core_pattern: Delays task initiation despite intention to complete
observable_behaviors: Delayed task start time > 60 minutes after alarm
Starting other tasks instead of intended task
Procrastination.mitigation_focus: Environmental design (break tasks into smaller units), time constraints (start before 1pm), incremental exposure to task initiation.

Indecisiveness.core_pattern: Difficulty making decisions due to fear of wrong choice
observable_behaviors: Delayed decision time > 60 minutes after information gathering
Indecisiveness.mitigation_focus: Setting time constraints for decisions, accepting 'good enough' choices, practicing decision-making.

Impulsivity.core_pattern: Acts without considering consequences or alternatives
observable_behaviors: Starting multiple tasks without completing previous ones
Impulsivity.mitigation_focus: Implementing pause mechanisms, creating decision checkpoints, practicing delayed gratification.

Jealousy.core_pattern: Fear of losing relationships or status to others
Jealousy.mitigation_focus: Conscious awareness of triggers, addressing underlying insecurities, building self-worth.

Arrogance.core_pattern: Overestimates own abilities and dismisses others' contributions
Arrogance.mitigation_focus: Seeking feedback integration, practicing humility, recognizing others' expertise.

Manipulation.core_pattern: Uses indirect influence to control others' behavior
Manipulation.mitigation_focus: Developing direct communication, practicing assertiveness, addressing needs openly.

Domineering_Behavior.core_pattern: Controls others through force, intimidation, or excessive demands
Domineering_Behavior.mitigation_focus: Practicing active listening, respecting boundaries, developing collaborative approaches.
